short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Hides the section: streams in your language

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Hides the Channels-in-{language} section

Click the extension to trigger the action,
or use the hotkey Alt + G.

Contribute in any way, shape or form through the repository:
https://github.com/pjheden/twitch-fixer-chrome-extension
